beforeHooks.title: "before all" hook

tests.title: Should open Store List, When I click "Pilih Store"
tests.fullTitle: Home page  Should open Store List, When I click "Pilih Store"
tests.code:
await loadUrl(page, config.baseUrl)

await shouldExist(page, '#home-select-store')
await click(page, '#home-select-store')

await shouldExist(page, '#search-store')

const url = await page.url()
expect(url).to.equal(`${config.baseUrl}/store-list`)

tests.title: Should open Store List, When I click Pen Icon
tests.fullTitle: Home page  Should open Store List, When I click Pen Icon
tests.code:
await loadUrl(page, config.baseUrl)
await shouldExist(page, '#home-button-edit')
await click(page, '#home-button-edit')
await shouldExist(page, '#search-store')

const url = await page.url()
expect(url).to.equal(`${config.baseUrl}/store-list`)

tests.title: Should Redirect to Play Store, When i click image Get It On Google Play
tests.fullTitle: Home page  Should Redirect to Play Store, When i click image Get It On Google Play
tests.code:
await loadUrl(page, config.baseUrl)
await shouldExist(page, '#home-button-edit')
await clickXpath(page, `//img[@class='icon-google']`)
const url = await page.url()
expect(url).to.include('fore')

tests.title: Should Redirect to Play Store, When i click image Download on the App Store
tests.fullTitle: Home page  Should Redirect to Play Store, When i click image Download on the App Store
tests.code:
await loadUrl(page, config.baseUrl)
await shouldExist(page, '#home-button-edit')
await clickXpath(page, `//img[@class='icon-apple']`)
const url = await page.url()
expect(url).to.include('fore')

beforeHooks.title: "before all" hook

tests.title: Successfully Logout
tests.code:
await shouldExist(page, '#menu-area')
await click(page, '#menu-area')

await shouldExist(page, '.button-exit')
await click(page, '.button-exit')

await shouldExist(page, '#home-button-menu')
await shouldExist(page, '#menu-area')
await click(page, '#menu-area')
await shouldExist(page, '#input-daftar')

beforeHooks.title: "before all" hook

tests.title: Should Redirect to Store Images Page, When i click "Jelajahi Store"
tests.fullTitle: Store Detail Should Redirect to Store Images Page, When i click "Jelajahi Store"
tests.code:
await loadUrl(page, `${config.baseUrl}/store-detail/64`)

await shouldExist(page, '#store-button-explore')
await click(page, '#store-button-explore')
const storeName = await getTextXpath(page, `//p[@class='navbar-page-title']`)
expect(storeName).to.equal(config.searchStore)
const url = await page.url()
expect(url).to.contain(`${config.baseUrl}/store-images`)

tests.title: Should Redirect to Menu Page, When i click Button "Pesan Dari Sini"
tests.fullTitle: Store Detail Should Redirect to Menu Page, When i click Button "Pesan Dari Sini"
tests.code:
await loadUrl(page, `${config.baseUrl}/store-detail/64`)

await shouldExist(page, '#store-button-select')
await click(page,'#store-button-select')

const storeName = await getTextXpath(page, `//p[@class='address-label']`)
expect(storeName).to.equal(config.searchStore)
const url = await page.url()
expect(url).to.contain(`${config.baseUrl}/order`)

tests.title: Verify if Phone Number contains 08
tests.fullTitle: Store Detail Verify if Phone Number contains 08
tests.code:
await loadUrl(page, `${config.baseUrl}/store-detail/64`)

await shouldExist(page, '#store-button-select')
const phoneNumber = await getAttribute(page, `//div[@class='contact-store-icon']//a`, 'href')

expect(phoneNumber).to.contain('08')

err.message: Error: Cannot get attribute from selector : //div[@class='contact-store-icon']//a
err.estack:
Error: Cannot get attribute from selector : //div[@class='contact-store-icon']//a

beforeHooks.title: "before all" hook

tests.title: Successfully Login
tests.code:
await loadUrl(page, config.baseUrl)

await shouldExist(page, '#home-button-menu')
await click(page, '#menu-area')

await shouldExist(page, '#input-daftar')
await typeText(page, config.phoneNumber, '#input-daftar')

await shouldExist(page, '#menu-button-continue')
await click(page, '#menu-button-continue')
const urlOtp = await page.url()
expect(urlOtp).to.contain('otp')
await shouldExist(page, '#register-otp-code')
await typeText(page, config.otp, '#register-otp-code')

const urlAccountView = await page.url()
expect(urlAccountView).to.contain('otp')
await shouldExist(page, '#register-name-view')
await logout(page)

tests.title: Show Pop up error, when login without phone number
tests.fullTitle: Login  Show Pop up error, when login without phone number
tests.code:
await loadUrl(page, config.baseUrl)

await shouldExist(page, '#home-button-menu')
await click(page, '#menu-area')

await shouldExist(page, '#input-daftar')
await shouldExist(page, '#menu-button-continue')
await click(page, '#menu-button-continue')
await clickXpath(page, `//div[@class='modal-container display-block']//button[@id='modal-notif-okay']`)

tests.title: show Pop up OOps, when input wrong otp 3 times
tests.fullTitle: Login  show Pop up OOps, when input wrong otp 3 times
tests.code:
await loadUrl(page, config.baseUrl)

await shouldExist(page, '#home-button-menu')
await click(page, '#menu-area')

await shouldExist(page, '#input-daftar')
await typeText(page, config.phoneNumber, '#input-daftar')

await shouldExist(page, '#menu-button-continue')
await click(page, '#menu-button-continue')
const urlOtp = await page.url()
expect(urlOtp).to.contain('otp')
await shouldExist(page, '#register-otp-code')
await typeText(page, '12345', '#register-otp-code')
await clearInput(page, '#register-otp-code')
await typeText(page, '54321', '#register-otp-code')
await clearInput(page, '#register-otp-code')
await typeText(page, '12543', '#register-otp-code')
await clickXpath(page, `//div[@class='modal-container display-block']//button[@id='modal-notif-okay']`)
await shouldExist(page, '#home-button-menu')

beforeHooks.title: "before all" hook

tests.title: Should Redirect to Store detail Page, when i click Back Button
tests.fullTitle: Store Detail Should Redirect to Store detail Page, when i click Back Button
tests.code:
await loadUrl(page, `${config.baseUrl}/store-images/64`)

await shouldExist(page, '#nav-button-back')
await click(page, '#nav-button-back')
const storeName = await getTextXpath(page, `//p[@class='store-name']`)
expect(storeName).to.equal(config.searchStore)
const url = await page.url()
expect(url).to.contain(`${config.baseUrl}/store-detail`)

beforeHooks.title: "before all" hook

tests.title: Search Result Should Match with Search Input
tests.fullTitle: Store List Search Result Should Match with Search Input
tests.code:
await loadUrl(page, `${config.baseUrl}/store-list`)

await shouldExist(page, '#search-store')
await typeText(page, config.searchStore,'#search-store')

const storeName = await getTextXpath(page, `//p[@class='store-name color-dark-grey']`)
expect(storeName).to.equal(config.searchStore)

tests.title: Should Redirect to Store Menu Page, When i choose Store
tests.fullTitle: Store List Should Redirect to Store Menu Page, When i choose Store
tests.code:
await loadUrl(page, `${config.baseUrl}/store-list`)

await shouldExist(page, '#search-store')
await typeText(page, config.searchStore,'#search-store')
await shouldExist(page, '#store-select')
await click(page, '#store-select')

const storeName = await getTextXpath(page, `//p[@class='address-label']`)
expect(storeName).to.equal(config.searchStore)
const url = await page.url()
expect(url).to.contain(`${config.baseUrl}/order`)

tests.title: Redirect to Store Detail Page, when i click Store Info
tests.fullTitle: Store List Redirect to Store Detail Page, when i click Store Info
tests.code:
await loadUrl(page, `${config.baseUrl}/store-list`)

await shouldExist(page, '#search-store')
await typeText(page, config.searchStore,'#search-store')

const storeName = await getTextXpath(page, `//p[@class='store-name color-dark-grey']`)
expect(storeName).to.equal(config.searchStore)
await shouldExist(page, '#store-select')
await click(page, '#store-detail')

await shouldExist(page, '#store-button-select')
const url = await page.url()
expect(url).to.contain(`${config.baseUrl}/store-detail`)

tests.title: Should redirect to Home page when i click back button
tests.fullTitle: Store List Should redirect to Home page when i click back button
tests.code:
await loadUrl(page, `${config.baseUrl}/store-list`)

await shouldExist(page, '#search-store')
await click(page, '#nav-button-back')

const url = await page.url()
expect(url).to.contain(`${config.baseUrl}/home`)
